attributes.action: Stop doctors from giving out steroid creams without proper warning
attributes.additional_details: People speaking up currently isn’t enough to make a difference and doctors are not listening anymore
attributes.background: Become more educated on the effects of topical steroids and make people aware BEFORE they use them

rejection.details:
According to NICE Clinical Guideline CG76 a healthcare professional must “discuss the benefits, side effects and long˗term effects with the patient to allow them to make an informed choice”.

You can start a new petition if there is a specific change you would like to call for.

If you have concerns about the advice you, or someone you know, has received from a healthcare professional please see this web page: https://www.england.nhs.uk/contact-us/feedback-and-complaints/complaint/.
